endpoints.description: Retrieve a list of registered factories with compliance monitoring enabled.
Add a new factory to the compliance monitoring system.
Retrieve current pollutant data for a specific factory.
Submit new pollutant data for a factory.
Generate actionable environmental compliance analytics for a factory.
Check the calibration status and due dates of a specific sensor.
Submit a completed calibration record for a specific sensor.
Retrieve historical compliance reports for all monitored factories.
Access specific details of a historical compliance report.
Remove a factory and its monitoring data from the system.
